name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Steven Dennis PACEK, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Steven Dennis PACEK, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Carol L. Rosen, Pittsburgh, for Steven Dennis Pacek.
John B. Mancke, Harrisburg, for ACLU/PACDL-Amicus.
Claire C. Capristo, Pittsburgh, James R. Gilmore, for Commonwealth.
casebody.head_matter:
707 A.2d 511
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Steven Dennis PACEK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 11, 1998.
Decided April 3, 1998.
Carol L. Rosen, Pittsburgh, for Steven Dennis Pacek.
John B. Mancke, Harrisburg, for ACLU/PACDL-Amicus.
Claire C. Capristo, Pittsburgh, James R. Gilmore, for Commonwealth.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
